briefTitle: To Evaluate Ezetimibe Plus Atorvastatin Versus Atorvastatin in Patients With High Cholesterol Not Controlled on Atorvastatin 40 mg (0653-090)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient with LDL-C \>70 mg/dL \& on a stable dose of atorvastatin 40 mg

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant or lactating women or intending to become pregnant
* Patient with sensitivity or intolerance to ezetimibe or atorvastatin

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Low-Density Lipoprotein (LDL)-C
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in LDL-C = \[(week 6 value - baseline value)/baseline value\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in High-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (HDL-C)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in HDL-C = \[(week 6 value - baseline value)/baseline value\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Non-High-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (Non-HDL-C)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in Non-HDL-C = \[(week 6 value - baseline value)/baseline value\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Total-Cholesterol
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in Total-C = \[(week 6 value - baseline value)/baseline value\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Triglycerides (TG)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in TG = \[(week 6 value - baseline value)/baseline value\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Apolipoprotein B (Apo B)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in Apo B = \[(week 6 value - baseline value)/baseline value\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Apolipoprotein A-I (Apo A-I)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in Apo A-I = \[(week 6 value - baseline value)/baseline value\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Total-Cholesterol (TC):High-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (HDL-C) Ratio
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in TC:HDL-C Ratio = \[(week 6 ratio - baseline ratio)/baseline ratio\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Low-Density Lipoprotein-Cholesterol:High-Density Lipoprotein-Cholesterol (LDL-C:HDL-C) Ratio
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in LDL-C:HDL-C Ratio = \[(week 6 ratio - baseline ratio)/baseline ratio\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Apolipoprotein B:Apolipoprotein A-I (Apo B:Apo A-I) Ratio
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in Apo B:Apo A-I Ratio = \[(week 6 ratio - baseline ratio)/baseline ratio\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Non-High-Density Lipoprotein-Cholesterol:High-Density Lipoprotein-Cholesterol (Non-HDL-C:HDL-C) Ratio
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in non-HDL-C:HDL-C Ratio = \[(week 6 ratio - baseline ratio)/baseline ratio\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in C Reactive Protein (CRP)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Change in CRP = \[(week 6 value - baseline value)/baseline value\]\*100%

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients Who Attained Target Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C) <70 mg/dL at Week 6
